plugins.name: marketplace-manager
plugins.description: Manage the fakoli-plugins marketplace: add/remove plugins, validate manifests, and regenerate registry indices

installation.notes: Requires jq for JSON processing. Install with: brew install jq (macOS) or apt-get install jq (Linux)

skills.name: marketplace-manager
skills.description: Manage the fakoli-plugins marketplace - add/remove plugins, validate, regenerate indices

commands.name: add-plugin
commands.description: Add a new plugin to the marketplace from template

commands.name: remove-plugin
commands.description: Remove a plugin from the marketplace

commands.name: install-workflows
commands.description: Install GitHub Actions workflows for plugin validation and registry updates

plugins.name: nano-banana-pro
plugins.description: Generate, edit, and remix images using Google's Gemini 3 Pro Image Preview model with style templates

installation.notes: Requires Python 3.10+ and uv package manager. Set GEMINI_API_KEY in environment or .claude/nano-banana-pro.local.md

skills.name: generate
skills.description: Image generation with Gemini 3 Pro - includes style templates for UI, marketing, and artistic styles

commands.name: generate-image
commands.description: Generate an image from a text prompt

commands.name: edit-image
commands.description: Edit an existing image with instructions

commands.name: remix-url
commands.description: Generate an image styled from a webpage's design
